member.name: T:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection
member.summary: Prevents all death of its target creature for a configurable delay and/or condition. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: P:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.Target
member.summary: The targeted creature.

member.name: P:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.SafePos
member.summary: The last known position considered "safe"; If the protected creature is destroyed, it is instead teleported to this position.

member.name: P:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.Power
member.summary: The power value for visual effects.

member.name: P:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.SaveCooldown
member.summary: If greater than 0, a cooldown where the creature is assumed to be alive; Prevents repeated attempts to revive the target causing no revival at all.

member.name: P:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.SavingThrows
member.summary: The amount of times the protection has saved Target from destruction in a row. If exceeding a given limit, the protection is destroyed.

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.revivalsLeft
member.summary: The amount of times the protection will attempt to revive its target creature. If this number reaches zero, the protection is destroyed.

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.lifespan
member.summary: An optional lifespan for the protection. If a condition is also provided, this acts as the "grace" timer before the protection can actually expire.

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.isInfinite
member.summary: If true, lifespan is ignored and the protection lasts until manually destroyed.

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.forceRevive
member.summary: If true and Target somehow dies while under this protection, it is instead revived.

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.isWaterBreathingCrit
member.summary: If true, deep bodies of water are considered as "safe positions" for returning Target in case of destruction.

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.safeChunkIndex
member.summary: The BodyChunk to use as reference for setting and retrieving the target creature's "safe position".

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.originalImmunities
member.summary: The natural immunities Target had prior to being protected, in the following order: Hypothermia, Lava, Tentacle. When the protection is removed, their respective fields are restored to their original values.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.#ctor(Creature,System.Int16,System.Nullable{WorldCoordinate},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new death protection instance which lasts until the given condition returns true.
member.param: The amount of time to wait before the protection can be removed.
An optional "safe" position, used when the creature is destroyed.
If true and somehow dies while protected, it is revived. This also immediately ends the protection.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.CreateInstance(Creature,System.Int16,System.Nullable{WorldCoordinate},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new death protection instance which lasts for the given amount of ticks.
member.param: The duration of the protection. Set to -1 for an indefinitely-lasting protection.
An optional "safe" position, used when the creature is destroyed.
If true and somehow dies while protected, it is revived. This also immediately ends the protection.
member.exception: target is not in a valid room -or- target is already being protected.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.HasProtection(Creature)
member.summary: Determines if a given creature is being protected from death.
member.returns: true if the given creature is being protected from death, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.TryGetProtection(Creature,ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection@)
member.summary: Attempts to retrieve the instance of a given creature, if any.
member.param: The retrieved protection instance. If none is found, this value is null.
member.returns: true if a valid protection instance was found, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtectionHooks.AvoidImmunePlayerHook(System.Func{Creature,System.Boolean},Creature)
member.summary: Grants the player Worm Grass immunity when protected from death.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtectionHooks.CreatureDeathHook(On.Creature.orig_Die,Creature)
member.summary: Prevents death-protected creatures from being killed with Creature.Die().

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtectionHooks.GrantSandstormImmunityHook(System.Func{PhysicalObject,System.Boolean},PhysicalObject)
member.summary: Makes death-immune creatures also immune to end-of-cycle sandstorms.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtectionHooks.IgnorePlayerRainDeathHook(On.RoomRain.orig_CreatureSmashedInGround,RoomRain,Creature,System.Single)
member.summary: Prevents the end of cycle rain from affecting Slugcat if protected.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtectionHooks.IgnoreWindAffectivenessHook(System.Func{Creature,System.Single},Creature)
member.summary: Prevents the player from being affected by wind while protected.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtectionHooks.InterruptGameOverHook(On.RainWorldGame.orig_GameOver,RainWorldGame,Creature.Grasp)
member.summary: Prevents the game over screen from showing up if a player is currently being protected.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtectionHooks.PreventAbstractCreatureDestructionHook(On.AbstractWorldEntity.orig_Destroy,AbstractWorldEntity)
member.summary: Prevents a creature's abstract representation from being destroyed while death-immune.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtectionHooks.PreventCreatureDestructionHook(On.UpdatableAndDeletable.orig_Destroy,UpdatableAndDeletable)
member.summary: Prevents the destruction of creatures who are under death protection.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtectionHooks.PreventPlayerDestructionHook(On.Player.orig_Destroy,Player)
member.summary: Disposes of the player's PossessionManager when Slugcat is destroyed. Also prevents death-protected players from being destroyed.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtectionHooks.IgnoreDeathPitDestructionILHook(MonoMod.Cil.ILContext)
member.summary: Prohibits death pits from ever attempting to kill or destroy protected creatures.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtectionHooks.IgnoreLeviathanBiteILHook(MonoMod.Cil.ILContext)
member.summary: Causes Leviathan bites to ignore death-protected creatures, just like it now ignores the Safari mode Overseer.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtectionHooks.IgnoreProtectedCreatureILHook(MonoMod.Cil.ILContext)
member.summary: Causes Leviathans to ignore creatures under death protection.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtectionHooks.IgnoreRepulsiveCreatureILHook(MonoMod.Cil.ILContext)
member.summary: Causes Worm Grass patches to fully ignore death-protected creatures.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtectionHooks.NoViolenceWhileProtectedILHook(MonoMod.Cil.ILContext)
member.summary: Prevents any violence against creatures who are death-protected. Why is it an IL hook? Because silly.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtectionHooks.PreventRainDropStunILHook(MonoMod.Cil.ILContext)
member.summary: Prevents rain drops from stunning creatures while protected.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtectionHooks.PreventRoomRainPushILHook(MonoMod.Cil.ILContext)
member.summary: Prevents the rain from pushing and stunning protected creatures.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtectionHooks.TrySaveFromDestruction(Creature)
member.summary: Attempts to save the given creature from being destroyed with . Most often occurs with death pits, but should also work for Leviathan bites and the likes.
member.returns: true if the creature has been saved (in this method call or another), false otherwise.

member.name: T:ModLib.Objects.FadingMeltLights
member.summary: A fully-independent implementation of SB_A14 and 's "void melt" effect, where the screen becomes golden for a moment, before smoothly fading to its usual palette again.
member.remarks: This object is purely visual, and has no effect on the player's Karma level.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.FadingMeltLights.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with the default effect strength and duration modifiers.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.FadingMeltLights.#ctor(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified effect strength and duration modifiers.
member.param: The speed at which the effect disappears. Must be a positive, non-zero value.
The initial strength of the effect; Ignored if the current room already has Void Melt. Must be a positive, non-zero value.
member.exception: speed is zero or a negative value. -or- strength is zero or a negative value.

member.name: P:ModLib.Objects.FadingMeltLights.FadeProgress
member.summary: The progress of the fade effect, ranging from 1f (strongest gold tint) to 0f (no gold tint, effect is removed).

member.name: T:ModLib.Objects.GlobalUpdatableAndDeletable
member.summary: A variant of which is updated independently of a room.
member.remarks: Instances of this class (or subtypes) are NOT synced upon joining a Rain Meadow server; Mods should roll their own sync implementation if Rain Meadow compatibility is desired.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.GlobalUpdatableAndDeletable.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:ModLib.Objects.IForbiddenToPull
member.summary: Specifies that a given object type cannot be pulled by a Blizzard Lizard's pull.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.Main.ForbidPullingMarkedTypesHook(On.Watcher.LizardBlizzardModule.orig_IsForbiddenToPull,Watcher.LizardBlizzardModule,UpdatableAndDeletable)
member.summary: Prevents Blizzard Lizards' blizzard shield from pushing around objects inheriting the interface.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.Meadow.MeadowProtectionHooks.IgnoreDeathMessageIfProtectedHook(System.Func{RainMeadow.OnlinePhysicalObject,System.Boolean},RainMeadow.OnlinePhysicalObject)
member.summary: Ignore cause-of-death messages for creatures under protection.
